property.name: displayQuickAction
property.label: Display Quick Action
property.description: When set to true and the Quick Action URL and label are provided, the quick action button in displayed

property.name: templateId
property.label: Template Id
property.description: The 15-character ID of the Trialforce template that is the basis for the trial sign-up. Salesforce must approve the template. If you donâ€™t specify an edition, a template ID is required

property.name: trialDays
property.label: Trial Days
property.description: The duration of the trial sign-up in days. Must be equal to or less than the trial days for the approved Trialforce template. If not provided, it defaults to the trial duration specified for the Trialforce template

property.name: isSignupEmailSuppressed
property.label: Suppress Signup Email
property.description: When set to true, no sign-up emails are sent when the trial org is created. This field is used for the Proxy Signup feature

property.name: shouldConnectToEnvHub
property.label: Should Connect to Environment Hub
property.description: When set to true, the trial org is connected to the Environment Hub. The sign-up must take place in the hub main org or a spoke org

property.name: signupSource
property.label: Signup Source
property.description: A user-specified description of the trial sign-up
